text: The 2004 Individual Speedway Junior World Championship ==Qualification== *Scandinavian Final (Semi-Final A): **August 30, 2004 ** Outrup *Semi-Final B: **July 17, 2004 ** Rivne *Semi-Final C: **July 17, 2004 ** Teterow ==Final== *August 28, 2004 * Rybnik ==See also== 2004 European I J
title: 2004 Individual Speedway Junior European Championship
